function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased visitation to urban green spaces","Impact":"Higher risk of contagious disease transmission due to overcrowding","Mitigation":"Implement capacity limits and crowd control measures","Technologies":"Smart monitoring systems for crowd tracking","People":"Visitors, local residents, park managers","Owner":"Park managers and local authorities"},{"Description":"Conflicts between different groups of visitors","Impact":"Potential for conflicts to escalate and increase disease transmission","Mitigation":"Public education on park regulations and social norms","Technologies":"Online educational programs, social media campaigns","People":"Visitors, local residents, park managers","Owner":"Park managers and local authorities"},{"Description":"Dependence on urban green spaces for mental health","Impact":"Increased pressure on green spaces to provide mental health support, potentially leading to overcrowding","Mitigation":"Promote alternative mental health support options and manage visitor expectations","Technologies":"Virtual mental health support platforms, informational websites","People":"Visitors, mental health support providers, park managers","Owner":"Local authorities, mental health organizations"}]}
